Summary: This UFO comes around every night that it is clear. Basically comes out around 6:00 pm, slowly ascends.
divs: Sighting DetailsThis UFO comes around every night. Anyone with a high powered 200 mm USM canon lense or equivalent, and some knowledge of camera work, can video this machine.
